metadata.title: Corral A3322 White Leather Glitter Inlay Boot with Crystals (7)
description: Say yes to the boot! This show stopping new arrival from Corral is just what you needed to add a little glitz and glam to your life! This genuine leather boot features a multi color glitter inlay and crystals throughout. This boot is perfect to pair with your wedding dress or any dress you want to add shimmer to! This boot is also not only flashy but is super comfortable for all day walking. Make this boot something your other boots will be jealous of! Please note that if you are ordering boots, the leather process and distressing is normal. Each boot is hand stitched and is individually unique. All our boots have been thoroughly inspected for true "defects" by the manufacture and our staff at Classy Crossroads. If you have questions about any pair of boots please contact our stylists for additional information.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "18 x 14 x 6 inches; 4.28 Pounds", "Item model number": "A3322", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "March 21, 2017"}
